issue.title: [C++] Add implicit Future(Status) constructor for convenience
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11730](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11730). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When working with functions that return Future<T>, this would let us use macros like ARROW_RETURN_NOT_OK and ARROW_ASSIGN_OR_RAISE without having to manually construct and set a future.
